subject: College Athletics
Race
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Bassett, who played for the Nets in the A.B.A. and the N.B.A., now runs a Manhattan bar and is writing a book about his life and his experiences at Georgia in the 1970s.
snippet: Tim Bassett, who played for the Nets in the A.B.A. and the N.B.A., now runs a Manhattan bar and is writing a book about his life and his experiences at Georgia in the 1970s.
